author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
There was a force push after this PR; is it still okay?

Looks like the git tree sha1 has changed:

```bash
bash-3.2$ git show HEAD --format=raw 
commit 0ea9d8d4502c45d2acc55cb310bde8a15c7185ea
tree 8f9d9d07688d172c99ffb77fc326077c8d86283e
parent e02a40814d4c5b33bd0bb3ccf03b7858b6b6aad5
author JohnnyChen <johnnychen94@hotmail.com> 1566415391 +0800
committer JohnnyChen <johnnychen94@hotmail.com> 1566416133 +0800

    release v0.0.1

```

--- Update

Okay, looks like re-triggering the registrator works.

I've created release `v0.0.1`, [here](https://github.com/johnnychen94/DemoCards.jl/releases/tag/v0.0.1) it is.
<!-- cd61cb60-c8cd-11e9-9765-8b6569520e75 -->
